title: 50 x 8oz Round Clear Plastic Food Containers with Lids – Microwave-Safe – for Hot Cold Takeaway Foods - Catering Grade (BPA Free)
description: Product Description Round 8oz Clear Food-grade Plastic Food Containers – A ideal choice for takeaway foods! Designed to maximize food freshness and leakproof transport, these clear plastic containers are ideal for display and takeaway of a multitude of hot and cold culinary dishes. The clear design and durable BPA-free construction of these food containers make a perfect solution for your food storage needs. Your kitchen or pantry space will look organized and clutter free, thanks to their space-saving, fully stackable design! Good Food Storage Containers - A worthy investment! These on-the-go plastic containers with lids make an excellent investment as they allow you to store, freeze, and reheat food all in the same container. The clear construction will let commercial establishments to showcase their signature food items. The clear lid makes it easy to identify what’s inside while keeping the contents secure. Moreover, these reusable containers are fully recyclable when you choose to throw them after using multiple times. 100% Leak-proof These clear food containers are tested to hold up every time with no leaks, thanks to the complementary firm-fitting, clear lid top. You can carry anything from salad dressing to sauces without any fear of leakages or drips during commute in a crowded bus, train or driving down a bumpy road. These containers are also ideal to withstand commercial use without worry of punctures or leaks. Stackable for Easy Organization These round plastic containers are designed to be conveniently stacked one over the other thanks to their fully stackable design. Easy stacking will let you minimize storage space in the kitchen shelves, countertop, or cupboard. Freeze or Reheat Prepared Meals Designed to be freezer- and microwave-friendly, these 8oz clear takeaway food containers are made of food-grade BPA-free plastic. The BPA-free construction makes these containers stain- and odour-resistant and a healthy alternative to ordinary plastic containers that leach harmful chemicals when exposed to extremely high or low temperatures.
